Title: Tales of Symphonia The Animation: Kaette Kita Kratos-sensei no Private Lesson
Description: ['A special animation that came with the blu-ray box set of the Tales Of Symphonia animation.', '\n', "\r\nKratos Sensei's private lesson is back! Except this time, since Kratos isn't around to teach, so the great Zelos takes his place! And he brings with him, a special announcement!"]
Related: ['Prequel: Tales of Symphonia The Animation: Kratos-sensei no Private Lesson']
